input.sentences: the kids were in the pool today .
after the pool they had a game to play .
it was a hot day on the field .
the coach was helping the kids .

output.sentences: The kids decided to get into the pool.
Then they decided to play a game.
They moved to a field to play on a hot day.
The kids helped the coach set up the game.
They got into lines and started playing.
